name: Apep
title: Apep - Chaos Serpent | Egyptian Mythology
subtitle:
Serpent of Chaos
     
     ,
     
      Enemy of Ra
shortDescription: Apep is the monstrous chaos serpent who attacks Ra's solar barque nightly during its journey through the Duat . Embodiment of isfet (chaos, disorder, darkness), eternally battling ma'at ( order ). Defeated nightly by Set and Ra 's defenders, but never permanently destroyed. Apep 's victory would mean the end of creation itself.
longDescription: Full detailed mythology and worship information coming soon. For now, see related deities and use the corpus search to explore ancient texts mentioning Apep .
